messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] About korean campaign
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Brand: Hi, if you are looking for English sources, Turnbull s book may be the only comprehensive source worthwhile to look at. or you can get segments
messages.messageBody:
Dear Brand:
Hi, if you are looking for "English" sources,
Turnbull's book may be the only "comprehensive" source
worthwhile to look at. or you can get segments of
information on the campaign from different sources.(I
guess people here can help you a lot for this case.)
If you can read either Japanese or Chinese, then you
can have more variety of access.

ps. Please, do not misinterprete my message as
supportive of Mr. Turnbull's position. As a person in
academy also, I found most of arguments posed by
people here on Mr. Turnbull's work legitimate.




Sincerely,




Changsub Lee

--- brand <pitibrand@...> wrote:

>

> turnbull ...and it turned
> out to be an execution comittee more than anything
> else. Anyway I think I've
> got the main idea about his works. Thank you guys :)
>
> Can you just give me good hints on authors I should
> try to get more
> knowledge about korean campaign ?
>
> In same perspective , could the webmaster of the
> website insert a reader's
> ranking or anything about the recommended books and
> also give more keywords
> to look for them?
>
> Thx
>
>

messages.subject: About korean campaign
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I think like I have started this whole thing about turnbull ...and it turned out to be an execution comittee more than anything else. Anyway I think
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

I think like I have started this whole thing about turnbull ...and it turned
out to be an execution comittee more than anything else. Anyway I think I've
got the main idea about his works. Thank you guys :)

Can you just give me good hints on authors I should try to get more
knowledge about korean campaign ?

In same perspective , could the webmaster of the website insert a reader's
ranking or anything about the recommended books and also give more keywords
to look for them?

Thx


----- Original Message -----
From: "Scott19NY" <scottc_4@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 6:44 AM
Subject: [samuraihistory] Suggested Authors


> People on here have been stating their opinions on Turnbull's works.
> However, Mark Said there are good Western authors. I would like
> suggestions on Western authors that would are more accurate and
> better sources then Turnbull so I can try to get some of their
> books.
>
>
>
>
